title: Bring Back Old Doom Bots Poll
body:
Old Doom bots, like the teemoing except no devil teemo, you were able to push all the way to the enemy nexus and win. However protected by the Doombots and with random garens and fiddles popping out from where'd ever you went.

**Edit: In the Old Doombots you had 5 different levels to pick from.**

Current Doombots or should I say "The Teemoing" is half the map cut off, with doom bots but basically a tower defence mode and while at 0:00 since it's a countdown a huge devil teemo will spawn in the middle of mid lane and slowly make it's way to your base, except the doombots protect it, it's super tank and does insane 1 shot dmg.

**Edit: The Teemoing has 2 levels to pick from. **

Imo I don't want "Doom bots" to be a "Tower Defence Mode" it should be more wild like the old one, where even pushing you'd get punished or spooked by a random Fiddle and Garen popping out of the Brush/bush.

replies.body: They have taken alot of the Rotating game mode and changed them, not for the better with all of them in my opinion either. I do miss the fact that Doom Bots is no longer an actual match but more of a tower defence game about wave clearing.
the old one was more challenging because it covered the entire map, to win current doom bots ppl just play ziggs
